column4: I just installed Kubuntu from within Ubuntu by following a page. I get the KDE login but Gnome is still the Window Manager. Here's the page -  https://help.ubuntu.com/search.html?cof=FORID%3A9&cx=003883529982892832976%3Ae2vwumte3fq&ie=UTF-8&q=installing+kubuntu
select session type at the login screen and change to kde
thanks :) I'm not familiar with KDE login. Works now.
